content:
ElasticPoolOperationsExtensions ElasticPoolOperationsExtensions Class

In this Article

Edit

The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases and servers.

Syntax

Declaration

public static class ElasticPoolOperationsExtensions : objectPublic Module ElasticPoolOperationsExtensions
    Inherits Object

Inheritance Hierarchy

    Object

      IElasticPoolOperations

      String

      String

      String

      Reference to the Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.IElasticPoolOperations.

    • resourceGroupName
      String
      String

      Required. The name of the Resource Group to which the server belongs.

    • serverName
      String
      String

      Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database is hosted.

    • elasticPoolName
      String
      String

      Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool to be retrieved.

    Returns

    • Task<DatabaseListResponse>
      Task(Of DatabaseListResponse)

      Represents the response to a List Azure Sql Database request.
